trans-unit.source: Indicates that a method defines an operation that is part of a service contract in a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) application.
trans-unit.target: 表示某個方法定義了一個作業，此作業是 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 應用程式中服務合約的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> to a method to indicate that the method implements a service operation as part of a service contract (specified by a <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute> attribute).
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> 套用至方法，以表示該方法實作了某個服務作業，做為服務合約的一部分 (由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute> 屬性指定)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> properties to control the structure of the operation and the values expressed in metadata:
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> 屬性控制作業結構，以及中繼資料表示的值︰

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> property specifies the action that uniquely identifies this operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> 屬性指定唯一識別此作業的動作。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] dispatches request messages to methods based on their action.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 會根據其動作來分派要求訊息給各方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> property indicates that the operation is implemented or can be called asynchronously using a Begin/End method pair.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> 屬性表示該作業使用 Begin/End 方法組實作，或可使用 Begin/End 方法組以非同步方式呼叫該作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.HasProtectionLevel%2A> property indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> property has been explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.HasProtectionLevel%2A> 屬性表示是否已明確設定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> property indicates that the operation only consists of a single input message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> 屬性表示作業僅由一個輸入訊息組成。

trans-unit.source: The operation has no associated output message.
trans-unit.target: 作業沒有相關的輸出訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> property specifies whether this operation can be the initial operation in a session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> 屬性指定此作業是否可成為工作階段中的初始作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsTerminating%2A> property specifies whether [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] attempts to terminate the current session after the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsTerminating%2A> 屬性指定該作業完成後，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 是否會嘗試結束目前的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> property specifies the message-level security that an operation requires at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> 屬性指定作業在執行階段所需的訊息層級安全性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ReplyAction%2A> property specifies the action of the reply message for the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ReplyAction%2A> 屬性指定該作業的回覆訊息動作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> attribute declares that a method is an operation in a service contract.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> 屬性宣告某個方法是服務合約中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Only methods attributed with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> are exposed as service operations.
trans-unit.target: 只有含 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> 屬性的方法才會公開成為服務作業。

trans-unit.source: A service contract without any methods marked with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> exposes no operations.
trans-unit.target: 若服務合約中，沒有任何方法以 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute> 標記，則不會公開任何作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> property indicates that a pair of `Begin`\<*methodName*> and `End`\<*methodName*> methods form a single operation implemented asynchronously (whether on the client or the service).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A>屬性表示一組`Begin` \< *methodName*> 和`End` \< *methodName*> 表單單一方法實作作業以非同步方式 （不論是在用戶端或服務上）。

trans-unit.source: The ability of a service to implement operations asynchronously is a service implementation detail and is not exposed in metadata (such as Web Services Description Language (WSDL)).
trans-unit.target: 服務是否能採用非同步方式實作作業，是服務實作的細節，不會公開在中繼資料上 (如 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL))。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, clients can choose to invoke operations asynchronously independent of how the service method is implemented.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，用戶端可選擇以非同步方式叫用作業，不論服務方法的實作方式為何。

trans-unit.source: Calling service operations asynchronously in the client is recommended when a service method takes some time but must return information directly to the client.
trans-unit.target: 若服務方法的執行需要一些時間，但必須直接傳回資訊給用戶端，則建議用戶端以非同步方式呼叫服務作業。

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> property indicates that a method does not return any value at all, including an empty underlying response message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> 屬性表示某個方法不會傳回任何值，包括空的基礎回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: This type of method is useful for notifications or event-style communication.
trans-unit.target: 這種類型的方法對通知或事件型通訊很有用。

trans-unit.source: Methods of this kind cannot return a reply message so the method's declaration must return `void`.
trans-unit.target: 這種方法不能傳回回覆訊息，所以方法宣告必須傳回 `void`。

trans-unit.source: When programmatically retrieving the information store in this attribute, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> class instead of reflection.
trans-unit.target: 在以程式設計方式擷取這個屬性中的資訊存放區時，使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>類別而不是反映。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> property is set to `false`, (the default), even methods that return `void` are two-way methods at the underlying message level.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> 屬性設為 `false` (預設值)，那麼就算該方法傳回 `void`，在基礎訊息層級一樣是雙向方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the infrastructure creates and sends an empty message to indicate to the caller that the method has returned.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，基礎結構會建立並傳送空白訊息，向呼叫者指出方法已傳回

trans-unit.source: Using this approach enables the application and the infrastructure to send error information (such as a SOAP fault) back to the client.
trans-unit.target: 此方式可讓應用程式與基礎結構將錯誤資訊 (例如 SOAP 錯誤) 傳回給用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> to `true` is the only way to prevent the creation and dispatch of a reply message.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> 設為 `true` 是避免建立與分派回覆訊息的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [One-Way Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/one-way-services.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[單向服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/one-way-services.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ReplyAction%2A> properties can be used not only to modify the default action of SOAP messages but also to create handlers for unrecognized messages or to disable adding actions for direct message programming.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> 與 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ReplyAction%2A> 屬性不只可用來修改 SOAP 訊息的預設動作，亦可建立處理常式來處理無法辨認的訊息，或停用直接訊息程式設計的加入動作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> property to prevent clients from calling a particular service operation prior to other operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> 屬性，避免用戶端在呼叫其他作業之前，先行呼叫某個特定服務作業。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsTerminating%2A> property to have [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] close the channel after clients call a particular service operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsTerminating%2A> 屬性，讓 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 在用戶端呼叫某個特定服務作業後關閉該通道。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Sessions](~/docs/framework/wcf/using-sessions.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Sessions<](~/docs/framework/wcf/using-sessions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> property enables you to specify on the operation contract whether the operation messages are signed, encrypted, or signed and encrypted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> 屬性可讓您在作業合約上，指定作業訊息是否簽署、加密，或同時採用簽署與加密。

trans-unit.source: If a binding cannot provide the security level required by the contract, an exception is thrown at run time.
trans-unit.target: 若繫結無法提供合約所需的安全性層級，在執行階段就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> and [Understanding Protection Level](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A>和[了解保護層級](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a simple service contract with one operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是一個簡單的服務合約，裡面只有一個作業。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a service that implements an implicit service contract that specifies three operations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是一個實作隱含服務合約的服務，此合約指定三個作業。

trans-unit.source: Two of the operations are two-way operations, which return underlying response messages to the caller no matter what the return value is.
trans-unit.target: 其中兩個作業是雙向作業，不論其傳回值為何，它們都會傳回基礎回應訊息給呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: The third operation receives a call, an underlying inbound message, but returns no underlying response message.
trans-unit.target: 第三個作業接收一個呼叫 (基礎傳入訊息)，但不傳回基礎回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the WS-Addressing action of the request message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要求訊息的 WS-Addressing 動作。

trans-unit.source: The action to use in generating the WS-Addressing Action header.
trans-unit.target: 用來產生 WS-Addressing 動作標頭的動作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> property to control the action of the method's input message.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A>屬性，即可控制方法的動作之輸入訊息。

trans-unit.source: Because [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] uses this action to dispatch an incoming message to the appropriate method, messages used within a contract operation must have unique actions.
trans-unit.target: 因為 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 使用本動作來分派傳入訊息給適當的方法，因此合約作業內使用的訊息必須擁有唯一的動作。

trans-unit.source: The default action value is a combination of the contract namespace (the default value is "http://tempuri.org/"), the contract name (interface name or the class name, if no explicit service interface is used), the operation name, and an additional string ("Response") if the message is a correlated response.
trans-unit.target: 預設動作值是合約命名空間的組合 (預設值是"http://tempuri.org/")，（介面名稱或類別名稱，如果使用沒有明確服務介面） 的合約名稱、 作業名稱，而其他的字串 ("Response") 如果相互關聯的回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: You can override this default with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> 屬性覆寫此預設。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that a service operation handles all messages that the service receives but cannot be directed to a service operation, specify the value "*" (an asterisk).
trans-unit.target: 若要表示某個服務作業會處理該服務所收到、但無法導向至服務作業的所有訊息，請指定該值為 "*" (星號)。

trans-unit.source: This type of operation, called an unmatched message handler, must have one of following method signatures, or a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown:
trans-unit.target: 這種作業 (稱作無對應訊息處理常式) 的方法簽章必須為下列之一，否則會擲回 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>︰

trans-unit.source: The service operation can take only a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> object and return a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> object.
trans-unit.target: 服務作業只能讀取一個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> 物件，並傳回一個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The service operation can take only a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> object and return nothing (that is, return `void`).
trans-unit.target: 服務作業只能讀取一個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> 物件，而不傳回任何東西 (也就是傳回 `void`)。

trans-unit.source: A service contract can have only one service operation with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> property set to "*".
trans-unit.target: 服務合約中，只能有一個把 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> 屬性設為 "*" 的服務作業。

trans-unit.source: Any group of service contracts hosted at the same listenUri that a service class implements can have many service operations with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> property set to "\*" when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 裝載在相同的 listenUri，服務類別會實作服務任何的合約群組可以有許多的服務作業與<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A>屬性設定為"\*」 時<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: However, only one of those service operations can have the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> property set to "\*" and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> property set to true.
trans-unit.target: 不過，只有其中一個這些服務作業可以有<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A>屬性設定為"\*"和<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A>屬性設為 true。

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a service that uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ReplyAction%2A> properties to explicitly control the SOAP actions of both the input and output (or reply) messages, and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Name%2A> property to control the name of the operation in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是一個服務，它使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> 與 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ReplyAction%2A> 屬性來明確控制輸入與輸出 (或回覆) 訊息的 SOAP 動作，也使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Name%2A> 屬性控制中繼資料內的作業名稱。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the application also uses an <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> value of "*" to indicate a method that handles unrecognized messages.
trans-unit.target: 最後，應用程式亦使用一個 "*" 的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> 值，表示用來處理無法辨認之訊息的方法。

trans-unit.source: A service that implements this contract sends messages that look like the following example:
trans-unit.target: 實作此合約的服務會傳送如下範例所示的訊息︰

trans-unit.source: The value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an operation is implemented asynchronously using a <see langword="Begin" /><*methodName*> and <see langword="End" /><*methodName*> method pair in a service contract.
trans-unit.target: 表示某個作業採用服務合約中的 <see langword="Begin" /><*methodName*> 和 <see langword="End" /><*methodName*> 方法組，以非同步方式實作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="Begin" /><*methodName*>method is matched by an <see langword="End" /><*methodName*> method and can be treated by the infrastructure as an operation that is implemented as an asynchronous method pair on the service interface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see langword="Begin" /> < *methodName*>所比對方法<see langword="End" /> < *methodName* >方法，可以處理由基礎結構即會實作成非同步方法組服務介面; 上的作業否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> property to build service operations that can be called asynchronously on the server, the client, or both.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> 屬性建置服務作業，伺服器、用戶端或兩者上可非同步呼叫該作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> property informs the runtime that a `Begin` method has a matched `End` method that conforms to the .NET Framework asynchronous method design pattern.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> 屬性通知執行階段某個 `Begin` 方法有符合的 `End` 方法，它們符合 .NET 架構的非同步方法設計模式。

trans-unit.source: Building server asynchronous methods that implement a service operation increases server scalability and performance without affecting the clients of the service, and is recommended when a service operation must return something to the client after performing a lengthy operation that can be performed asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 建置實作服務作業的伺服器非同步方法，可提升伺服器延展性與效能，而不會影響服務用戶端。若某項服務作業必須傳回某些資訊給用戶端，但執行時間較長，又可採用非同步方式執行，則建議採用此種做法。

trans-unit.source: Clients remain unaffected because the asynchronous method pair on the server is an implementation detail that does not affect the underlying Web Services Description Language (WSDL) description of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端不受影響，因為伺服器上的非同步方法組是實作細節，不影響該作業的基礎 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 描述。

trans-unit.source: Such methods appear to clients as a single operation with `<input>` and correlated `<output>` messages.
trans-unit.target: 這類方法給用戶端會顯示為具有單一作業`<input>`和相互關聯`<output>`訊息。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] automatically routes inbound messages to the `Begin`\<*methodName*> method and routes the results of the `End`\<*methodName*> call to the outbound message.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 會自動路由至輸入的訊息`Begin` \< *methodName*> 方法，並將結果路由`End` \< *methodName*> 呼叫外寄訊息。

trans-unit.source: Client channels, therefore, can represent the method pair as either a single synchronous operation or as an asynchronous operation pair.
trans-unit.target: 因此，用戶端通道可將該方法組表示成單一同步作業或非同步作業組。

trans-unit.source: In no case does the client representation affect the asynchronous implementation on the server in any way.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端的表示方式絕對不會影響到伺服器上的非同步實作。

trans-unit.source: Client contracts can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> property to indicate an asynchronous method pair that the client can use to invoke the operation asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端合約可使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> 屬性表示一組非同步方法組，用戶端可使用此方法組以非同步方式叫用該作業。

trans-unit.source: Typically, client applications use the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md) tool and the `/async` option to generate a `Begin`\<*methodName*> and `End`\<*methodName*> method pair that the client can use to invoke the operation asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應用程式通常使用[ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)工具和`/async`選項，以產生`Begin` \< *methodName*>和`End` \< *methodName*> 用戶端可用來以非同步方式叫用作業的方法組。

trans-unit.source: If a service operation has both an asynchronous and a synchronous version, the default behavior on the service is to invoke the synchronous version.
trans-unit.target: 若服務作業同時有同步版與非同步版，則服務的預設行為是叫用同步版。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a client channel to a service contract that includes both a synchronous version of `Add` and an asynchronous version.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範用戶端通道至一個服務合約，該合約同時包含 `Add` 的同步版與非同步版。

trans-unit.source: If the contract interface is used on the client, both the `BeginAdd` and the `Add` operation invoke a method on the server that may or may not be synchronous.
trans-unit.target: 若用戶端使用該合約介面，則 `BeginAdd` 與 `Add` 作業會叫用伺服器上的方法，而該方法可能是同步的，也可能是非同步的。

trans-unit.source: If the contract is used to implement the service, the default is that incoming requests are dispatched to the synchronous method.
trans-unit.target: 若使用該合約來實作服務，則傳入要求預設會分派給同步版方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the messages for this operation must be encrypted, signed, or both.
trans-unit.target: 取得指出此作業的訊息是否必須加密及/或簽署的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel" /> property is set to a value other than <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.None" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel" /> 屬性設為 <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.None" /> 以外的值，則為<see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.HasProtectionLevel%2A> property to determine whether a specific protection level is required by the messages of this operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.HasProtectionLevel%2A> 屬性，判斷此作業的訊息是否需要特定的保護層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the method implements an operation that can initiate a session on the server (if such a session exists).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示某個方法是否實作了可以在伺服器上初始化工作階段的作業 (若這樣的工作階段存在的話)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operation is permitted to initiate a session on the server, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允許作業在伺服器上初始化工作階段，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> property controls whether an operation can be the first operation called when a session is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> 屬性控制作業是否可在工作階段建立時，成為第一個被呼叫的作業。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> must be either <xref:System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.Allowed> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.Required> and the binding used must require or allow sessions for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> property to work properly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 的值必須為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.Allowed> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.SessionMode.Required>，而且使用的繫結必須要求或允許工作階段，<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> 屬性才能正常運作。

trans-unit.source: The default is `true`, which means that an operation can be the first one called on a channel.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 `true`，表示作業可成為通道上第一個被呼叫的作業。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to the initiating method have no effect, other than to call the method.
trans-unit.target: 除了呼叫此方法，後續對初始化方法的呼叫就不再有效用。

trans-unit.source: No other sessions are created.
trans-unit.target: 不會再建立其他工作階段。

trans-unit.source: If the contract does not make use of a session, setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> to `false` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 若合約不使用工作階段，則將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> 設為 `false` 的設定會忽略。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> to `false` to force clients to call another method on the service before they can invoke this one.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您可將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> 設為 `false`，強制用戶端在叫用此方法前，先呼叫服務上的另一個方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your service has a series of operations that depend on an order ID number, you can set <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> to `true` for a `GetOrderId` service operation and set all remaining service operations to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若您的服務有一系列的作業，這些作業依存於一個訂單 ID 號碼，您可將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A>`true`服務作業的`GetOrderId``false` 設為 ，將其餘服務作業設為 。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that each new client obtains an order ID prior to using the other methods exposed by the service.
trans-unit.target: 這樣可確保每個新用戶端在使用服務所公開的其他方法之前，都先取得了訂單 ID。

trans-unit.source: There is an interaction between <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> 與 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> 屬性之間有互動。

trans-unit.source: A service contract can have only one service operation with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> property set to "*".
trans-unit.target: 服務合約中，只能有一個把 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> 屬性設為 "*" 的服務作業。

trans-unit.source: Any group of service contracts hosted at the same listen URI that a service class implements can have many service operations with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> property set to "\*" when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 裝載在相同的接聽 URI，服務類別會實作服務任何的合約群組可以有許多的服務作業與<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A>屬性設定為"\*」 時<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: However, only one of those service methods can have the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> property set to "\*" and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，只有其中一個服務方法可以有<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A>屬性設定為"\*"和<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsInitiating%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If a service receives a message for a non-initiating operation, the service returns an ActionNotSupported SOAP fault.
trans-unit.target: 若服務收到一個非初始化作業的訊息，該服務會傳回 ActionNotSupported SOAP 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The client experiences this as an <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端會把它當做 <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>。

trans-unit.source: If a client calls a non-initiating operation first, the client runtime throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若用戶端先呼叫非初始化作業，用戶端會擲回 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Sessions](~/docs/framework/wcf/using-sessions.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Sessions<](~/docs/framework/wcf/using-sessions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a service that implements a service contract that specifies three methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是一個實作服務合約的服務，此合約指定三個方法。

trans-unit.source: The service requires a session.
trans-unit.target: 此服務需要工作階段。

trans-unit.source: If a caller's first call is to any operation other than `MethodOne`, the channel is refused and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 若呼叫者先呼叫其他作業，而非 `MethodOne`，通道會拒絕並擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When a caller initiates a session by calling `MethodOne`, that caller can terminate the communication session at any time by calling `MethodThree`.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫者呼叫 `MethodOne` 以初始化工作階段時，該呼叫者隨時可呼叫 `MethodThree` 終止通訊工作階段。

trans-unit.source: `MethodTwo` can be called any number of times during a session.
trans-unit.target: 在工作階段期間，可任意呼叫 `MethodTwo`，次數不限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an operation returns a reply message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出作業是否傳回回覆訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this method receives a request message and returns no reply message; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法接收要求訊息且不會傳回回覆訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> property to indicate that an operation does not return a reply message.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> 屬性表示某個作業不會傳回回覆訊息。

trans-unit.source: This type of operation is useful for notifications or event-style communication, especially in two-way communication.
trans-unit.target: 這種類型的作業對通知或事件型通訊很有用，尤其是雙向通訊。

trans-unit.source: Without waiting for an underlying response message, callers of one-way operations have no direct way to detect a failure in processing the request message.
trans-unit.target: 由於呼叫者呼叫單向作業時，不會等待基礎回應訊息，因此呼叫者沒有直接的方式，可以偵測到處理要求訊息的失敗

trans-unit.source: (Service applications that use reliable channels and one-way operations can detect a message delivery failure at the channel level.
trans-unit.target: (使用可靠通道與單向作業的服務應用程式，可在通道層級偵測到訊息傳遞失敗。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Reliable Sessions Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/reliable-sessions-overview.md).)
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[可靠工作階段概觀](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/reliable-sessions-overview.md)。)

trans-unit.source: In duplex (or two-way) service-oriented applications in which the client and server communicate with each other independently, a client channel can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> property on its methods to indicate that the service can make one-way calls to the client that the client can treat as events.
trans-unit.target: 在雙工 (或雙向) 服務導向應用程式中，用戶端與伺服器彼此獨立地進行通訊，用戶端通道可在其方法上使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> 屬性，表示該服務可對用戶端進行單向呼叫，用戶端會把它視為事件。

trans-unit.source: No return call or message is generated because the service does not expect any response message.
trans-unit.target: 不會產生傳回呼叫或訊息，因為該服務不期待任何回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> property is set to `false` (the default), even methods that return `void` result in a reply message.
trans-unit.target: 若 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> 屬性設為 `false` (預設值)，那麼就算方法的傳回值為 `void`，一樣會產生回覆訊息。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the infrastructure creates and sends an empty message to indicate to the caller that the method has returned.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，基礎結構會建立並傳送空白訊息，向呼叫者指出方法已傳回

trans-unit.source: (Using this approach enables the infrastructure to send SOAP faults back to the client.) Setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> to `true` is the only way to cancel the creation and dispatch of a response message.
trans-unit.target: (此方式可讓基礎結構將 SOAP 錯誤傳回給用戶端)。將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsOneWay%2A> 設為 `true` 是取消建立與分派回應訊息的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: One-way methods must not return a value or have `ref` or `out` parameters; otherwise a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 單向方法不能有傳回值或擁有 `ref` 或 `out` 參數，否則會擲回 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=nameWithType> 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Specifying that an operation is a one-way operation means only that there is no response message.
trans-unit.target: 指定某個作業為單向作業，只是表示它沒有回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to block if a connection cannot be made, or the outbound message is very large, or if the service cannot read inbound information fast enough.
trans-unit.target: 若無法建立連線、傳出訊息過大，或該服務無法快速的讀取資訊，該作業仍可能封鎖。

trans-unit.source: If a client requires a non-blocking call, generate <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> operations.
trans-unit.target: 若用戶端需要不會封鎖的呼叫，請產生 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.AsyncPattern%2A> 作業。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [One-Way Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/one-way-services.md) and [Accessing Services Using a WCF Client](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[單向服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/one-way-services.md)和[使用 WCF 用戶端存取服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a service that implements a service contract that specifies three operations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是一個實作服務合約的服務，此合約指定三個作業。

trans-unit.source: Two of the methods implement two-way operations, which return underlying response messages to the caller no matter what the return value is.
trans-unit.target: 其中兩個方法實作雙向作業，不論其傳回值為何，它們都會傳回基礎回應訊息給呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: The third method implements an operation that receives a call (an underlying inbound message) but returns no underlying response message.
trans-unit.target: 第三個方法實作一個接收呼叫的作業 (基礎傳入訊息)，但不傳回基礎回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service operation causes the server to close the session after the reply message, if any, is sent.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示服務作業在傳送回覆訊息 (如果有的話) 之後，是否導致伺服器關閉該工作階段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operation causes the server to close the session, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業會導致伺服器關閉工作階段，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsTerminating%2A> property to indicate that calling a service operation terminates the communication session.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsTerminating%2A> 屬性，表示呼叫某個服務作業會終止通訊工作階段。

trans-unit.source: In a client application, a value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsTerminating%2A> set to `true` instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to close the channel after the reply arrives.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端應用程式中，<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsTerminating%2A> 的值設為 `true`，會讓 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 在回覆到達後關閉該通道。

trans-unit.source: In a service, a timer is set and the channel aborts if the client does not close the channel within that period.
trans-unit.target: 服務中會設定計時器，若用戶端沒有在該時段內關閉通道，通道就會中止。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using this property with sessions, see [Using Sessions](~/docs/framework/wcf/using-sessions.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用此屬性的工作階段的詳細資訊，請參閱[Sessions<](~/docs/framework/wcf/using-sessions.md)。

trans-unit.source: If a caller is listening for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.OperationCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event for an <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsTerminating%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> operation, it is possible to block when the response is received.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫者正在接聽 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.OperationCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> 作業的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.IsTerminating%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 事件，當收到回應時，它可能會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The proper way to handle this is to schedule work on another thread when <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.OperationCompleted> is raised and then immediately return from that event handler.
trans-unit.target: 處理這種情況的正確方式是，當引發 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.OperationCompleted> 時在另一個執行緒上排程工作，然後立即從該事件處理常式傳回。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a service that implements a service contract that specifies three operations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是一個實作服務合約的服務，此合約指定三個作業。

trans-unit.source: The service requires a stateful connection.
trans-unit.target: 此服務需要一個可設定狀態的連線。

trans-unit.source: If a caller's first call is to any operation other than `MethodOne`, the channel is refused and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 若呼叫者先呼叫其他作業，而非 `MethodOne`，通道會拒絕並擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When a caller initiates a session by calling `MethodOne`, that caller can terminate the communication session at any time by calling `MethodThree`.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫者呼叫 `MethodOne` 以初始化工作階段時，該呼叫者隨時可呼叫 `MethodThree` 終止通訊工作階段。

trans-unit.source: `MethodTwo` can be called any number of times during a session.
trans-unit.target: 在工作階段期間，可任意呼叫 `MethodTwo`，次數不限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定作業的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 作業的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Name%2A> property to override the <`operation`> element name in WSDL.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Name%2A>屬性來覆寫 <`operation`> WSDL 中的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default operation name is the name of the implementing method.
trans-unit.target: 預設作業名稱是實作方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Name%2A> property to declare the name of the operation as exposed in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Name%2A> 屬性來宣告中繼資料內所公開的作業名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the messages of an operation must be encrypted, signed, or both.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，此值指定某個作業的訊息是否須加密、簽署，或兩者都進行。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> property to control whether the messages of an operation must be encrypted, signed, or both.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> 屬性，來控制某個作業的訊息是否需加密、簽署，或兩者都進行。

trans-unit.source: The value set here is the default value for all messages specified for this operation unless a narrower scope overrides this value.
trans-unit.target: 除非較窄的範圍覆寫了此值，否則這裡設定的值，會成為本作業指定的所有訊息的預設值。

trans-unit.source: It is important to remember that the protection behavior at runtime is the combination of the protection-level values set on the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 請記住，執行階段的保護行為，是以下屬性的保護層級設定值的組合，這點很重要。

trans-unit.source: These properties have a hierarchical structure.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性有階層式結構。

trans-unit.source: Setting the outermost value establishes the default setting for all narrower scopes unless a different value for a narrower scope is explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 除非針對較窄的範圍明確設定不同的值，否則，設定最外層的值會建立所有較窄範圍的預設值。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the outer value remains the default for all narrower scopes with the exception of that specifically set.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，外部值仍為所有較窄範圍的預設值 (特別設定的範圍除外)。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> and no other narrower scopes have protection level settings, all messages in an operation contract are encrypted and signed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 設定為 <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign?displayProperty=nameWithType> 而且沒有其他更窄的範圍具有保護層級設定，則會加密並簽署作業合約中的所有訊息。

trans-unit.source: If, however, one of those operations has the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> set to <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.Sign?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then the messages for that operation are signed but all other messages in the contract are encrypted and signed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果這些其中一個作業已將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A> 設定為 <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.Sign?displayProperty=nameWithType>，則會簽署該作業的訊息，但是合約中的其他所有訊息都會經過加密並簽署。

trans-unit.source: For details about protection levels and their assumptions and scopes, see [Understanding Protection Level](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需保護層級及其假設和範圍的詳細資訊，請參閱[了解保護層級](~/docs/framework/wcf/understanding-protection-level.md)。

trans-unit.source: The scopes at which these values are set are:
trans-unit.target: 設定這些值的範圍如下：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractMemberAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property on <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractMemberAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractMemberAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property on <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageBodyMemberAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractMemberAttribute.ProtectionLevel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageBodyMemberAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When there is no protection level explicitly specified on the contract and the underlying binding supports security (whether at the transport or message level), the effective protection level for the whole contract is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 當合約上未明確指定保護層級，而且基礎繫結可支援安全性 (不論是在傳輸層級或訊息層級) 時，整個合約的有效保護層級會是 <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.EncryptAndSign?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the binding does not support security (such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>), the effective <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel?displayProperty=nameWithType> is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the whole contract.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結不支援安全性 (例如，<xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>)，整個合約的有效 <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel?displayProperty=nameWithType> 為 <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The result is that depending upon the endpoint binding, clients can require different message or transport level security protection even when the contract specifies <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 結果便是根據端點繫結的不同，用戶端可以要求不同的訊息或傳輸層級的安全性保護，即使當合約指定 <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> 時亦然。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 該值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the SOAP action for the reply message of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定作業之回覆訊息的 SOAP 動作值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the SOAP action for the reply message.
trans-unit.target: 回覆訊息的 SOAP 動作值。

trans-unit.source: In addition to specifying a particular value for the action header of the reply message, you can also specify the string "*" (an asterisk).
trans-unit.target: 除了指定回覆訊息的動作標頭之特定值之外，您亦可指定 "*" (星號) 字串。

trans-unit.source: Specifying an asterisk in the service instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] not to add a reply action to the message, which is useful if you are programming against messages directly.
trans-unit.target: 在服務中指定星號，會使 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 不會在訊息中新增回覆動作，若您直接對訊息進行程式設計，這便非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Specifying an asterisk in a client application instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] not to validate the reply action.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端應用程式中指定星號，會使 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 不去驗證回覆動作。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a service that uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ReplyAction%2A> properties to explicitly control the SOAP actions of both the input and output (or reply) messages.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例中的服務使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Action%2A> 與 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ReplyAction%2A> 屬性，明確控制輸入與輸出 (或回覆) 訊息的 SOAP 動作。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Name%2A> property to declare the name of the operation as exposed in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 它亦使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.Name%2A> 屬性來宣告中繼資料內所公開的作業名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ReplyAction" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.OperationContractAttribute.ReplyAction" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
